H0.text: During collection, the most energy is transferred from the Sun to water in the water cycle.

H1.text: During evaporation, the most energy is transferred from the Sun to water in the water cycle.

H2.text: During condensation, the most energy is transferred from the Sun to water in the water cycle.

H3.text: During precipitation, the most energy is transferred from the Sun to water in the water cycle.

A4.text: The energy from the sun heats the water during evaporation.

A5.text: When water condenses it releases energy and heat.
